GeneDef.label: Gamma Perpetual
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are known to be effectively immortal, never aging and capable of ultimately healing almost any injury as a result of their extraordinarily rapid and efficient cellular regeneration.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Will resurrect from most lethal injuries after 3-4 days.
Self healing capabilities, including healing permanent wounds and restoration of lost limbs.
